name: Espresso Systems
intro: High throughput EVM compatible privacy blockchain
introduce: Espresso Systems is a EVM-compatible blockchain that provides scaling and privacy systems for Web 3 applications.By integrating a proof-of-stake consensus protocol with a zero-knowledge (zk) rollup mechanism, Espresso Systems can bundle multiple transactions in a more resource-efficient way.Espresso Systems’s Configurable Asset Privacy for Ethereum (CAPE) smart contract application is intended to offer creators customizable privacy regarding sender and receiver addresses and the amount and type of assets held or in movement. The elements can all be set to public, private or only transparent to select parties.
